Detailed Description

Main audio class. Should start programming from here. Provide main interface to play music, control it and fetch information about it.

bool SilentMedia::Audio::Audio::init ( string  driver  ) 

Initialized audio system with appropriate sound driver.

Parameters:
[in] driver audio system driver.
Returns:
true in success, false in error.
See also:
http://www.xiph.org/ao/doc/drivers.html
